name: Cylinder Game
description:
Selected as Best New Games in Music category by Apple

Cylinder Game is endless, rhythm based game with super addictive gameplay.
You have to guide jumping ball up and up on branched cylinder and generate as many score as you can. Change cylinder position by simply tapping on the right and left side of the screen. When reaching higher branches on the cylinder, game speed is getting faster.

Main Features:

- Super addictive, endless gameplay
- Vivid, neon style design
- Different levels to go through
- Unique, specially composed soundtrack
- Built in Game Center to track friend scores

Download Cylinder Game now and don’t forget to leave positive review!
